    </a>
   </h1>

          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="#Stopasianhate" data-vars-position="3" href="/life/a35549511/asian-american-hate-crimes-2021/">
            Hate Crimes Against Asian Americans Are Rising
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item asian-americans-racist-attacks-how-to-help image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="#Stopasianhate" data-vars-position="4" href="/life/a35867272/asian-americans-racist-attacks-how-to-help/">

       <div class="custom-item does-lululemon-have-sales image-right">
        <div class="custom-item-inner">

       <div class="feed-block-column">

         <div class="custom-item loungewear-sets column-stacked">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="FASHION" data-vars-position="2" href="/fashion/trends/g32009498/loungewear-sets/">
            <img alt="cute loungewear sets and brands" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/loungewear1-1611848769.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/loungewear1-1611848769.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/loungewear1-1611848769.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/loungewear1-1611848769.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/loungewear1-1611848769.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">

        <div class="feed-block-column-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="" data-vars-block-slot="13" data-vars-block-type="Big Story Feed Block">

       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <span>
          THE LATEST
         </span>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Site" data-vars-block-id="b1b05be4-a7d2-426d-9944-5b05d378fdca" data-vars-block-slot="15" data-vars-block-type="Page Content Block">
        <div class="custom-item the-falcon-and-the-winter-soldier-season-2">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="THE LATEST" data-vars-position="1" href="/celebrity/movies-tv/a35889125/the-falcon-and-the-winter-soldier-season-2/">

   ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/seventeen/assets/css/homepage.92a38ea.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/seventeen/assets/css/homepage-mobile.5eb0204.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
  </script>
